noun.description: The action of throwing someone out of a window.
examples: death by defenestration has a venerable history

noun.description: The action of dismissing someone from a position of power or authority.
examples: that victory resulted in Churchill's own defenestration by the war-weary British electorate

origin: Early 17th century: from modern Latin defenestratio(n-), from de- down from + Latin fenestra window.
